channel.title: Life-Update on bkjha.com
channel.description: Recent content in Life-Update on bkjha.com

item.title: back again
item.description: hi, aadab, namaskar, sat sri akal, hola it’s been more than 2 and half year since i last posted something here. i’ll use this post as an opportunity to go back in time. it’s been so long that i even forgot how to use Hugo(the framework used for this blog). in between, the domain had expired. thankfully no one claimed it for more than an year - perks of choosing a not so fancy domain name.
